fields.description:
right now GenericUDFOPEqualNS is displayed a "=" in explains; however it should be "<=>"....
this may cause some confusion...

related qtest: is_distinct_from.q

same: GenericUDFOPNotEqualNS
fields.summary: GenericUDFOPEqualNS may not use = in plan descriptions

comments.body: As discussed, instead of "<=>" I'll use "IS NOT DISTINCT FROM", as that matches the SQL Standards.
